-- | 24-bit word and int types for GHC
--   
--   24-bit Word and Int data types.
@package word24
@version 1.0.3


module Data.Word.Word24

-- | 24-bit unsigned integer type
data Word24
W24# :: Word# -> Word24
narrow24Word# :: Word# -> Word#
instance Eq Word24
instance Ord Word24
instance Storable Word24
instance Bits Word24
instance Read Word24
instance Ix Word24
instance Bounded Word24
instance Integral Word24
instance Enum Word24
instance Real Word24
instance Num Word24
instance Show Word24


-- | The 24 bit integral datatype, <a>Int24</a>.
module Data.Int.Int24

-- | 24-bit signed integer type
data Int24
I24# :: Int# -> Int24
narrow24Int# :: Int# -> Int#
instance Eq Int24
instance Ord Int24
instance Storable Int24
instance Bits Int24
instance Read Int24
instance Ix Int24
instance Bounded Int24
instance Integral Int24
instance Enum Int24
instance Real Int24
instance Num Int24
instance Show Int24
